cast.overview: When the popular, restless Landon Carter is forced to participate in the school drama production, he falls in love with Jamie Sullivan, the daughter of the town's minister. Jamie has a "to-do" list for her life, as well as a very big secret she must keep from Landon.
cast.title: A Walk to Remember

details.biography: Matt Lutz was born on October 15, 1978 in Anderson, Indiana, USA as Matthew Christopher Lutz. He is an actor, known for A Walk to Remember (2002), Bringing Down the House (2003) and Sudden Death! (2010). He was previously married to Christy Hall.
details.name: Matt Lutz
